video_prompt: A large, armored boar-creature, holding a glowing orb, looks directly at the viewer. The orb pulsates subtly, casting shifting light on its metallic armor and fur. The creature's fiery eyes track the viewer, conveying an evolving range of intense expressions. The smoky background subtly swirls and alters in depth.
image_prompt: Formidable anthropomorphic boar-wolf warrior, full body, intense, molten eyes, dark blue-gray shaggy fur, ornate dark metal armor with golden accents, large geometric medallion. Gently cradling a glowing yellow orb in clawed hands. Muted smoky background (light to dark gray). Digital painting, detailed, gritty, painterly.
refined_video_prompt: A pulsating orb subtly casts shifting light across its immediate surroundings. An intense, evolving range of expressions develops within a gaze that actively tracks the viewer. Concurrently, the background fluidly swirls, its depth continuously altering.
